=Pattern Editor=
<br> 
http://lh6.ggpht.com/_82S9Tngrad8/TDI63YFOz_I/AAAAAAAAA4I/-thzI1mnAwk/PSGed_v07a.02_edit_pattern.png
 * Click on the boxes to enable sound. Click on the same box to activate up to two variations of the sound (marked with three shades of blue).
 * With the {{{[GRAPH]}}} or the second button may be disabled or adding a note of silence mark (yellow). 
 * Set pattern (red arrow button). Select the pattern you are editing in the position of the sequence. 
 * Play the pattern ({{{[Select]}}} key). 
 * (CLR) - Clears the pattern indicated. 
 * (COPY) - Copies the selected pattern on the right. 
 * Pattern Number - Displays the data of the selected pattern. 
 * A, B, C - Press to activate or deactivate the mute the channel ({{{[1]}}}, {{{[2]}}} and {{{[3]}}} keys).
